organic.title: DDoS Prevention Guide - League of Legends Support
organic.snippet: A DDoS (Distributed Denial-of-Service) is an overflow of information packets sent to an IP address (usually by malicious PC ninjas). Most common connections won't be able to handle all of these packets, so they will be effectively blocked from maintaining a connection until the attack lets up.

organic.title: League of Legends - Demon's Hand Minigame
organic.snippet: Your goal is to whittle away the enemy's health before they get yours. To do this, assemble hands to deal damage based on the attack values of the cards you play.

organic.snippet: Attack of the Chromacrashers. Avatar. Laserface. May 17, 2024 at 11:11 AM. organic.title: What's New in Alpha Lab 2 - 2XKO - Riot Games
organic.snippet: Super 1 = S1 + any attack button (L, M, or H); Super 2 = S2 + any attack button (L, M, or H); Ultimate = S1 + S2. Tag Launcher is now (↓ + T) instead of T.
